revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: 1- [Year 15, 3rd month of summer, day 10?] of Tiberiu[s Cae]sar Seb[astos];2- [the god, the son of the god. Has said] PN (a woman) daughter of [Herieus], the ; Superintendent of the Lake Wadjwer of Nephersatis,;3- [whose mother is . . .] speaking in voice to [the Lord of Purificat]ion, Superintendent of; the Lake Wadjwer of Nephersatis,;4- . . .] whose mother is . . .t;-ì;, my son. I am far [from you];5- . . .] with respect to the 7 and one-third share within this half share of this house;6- [which is built and furnished with (roof) beams and door]s, it being two-storied, along with; its courtyard which forms for it the East, along with . . .;7- [all that is in it, undivid]ed, which is on the western district of the Sobek town of �ǣthe ; Island of Sobek, lord of the Pay-district,�ǥ;8- [the great god, which is on the] north [shore of] the Moeris canal, which is in the ; Herakleides division;9- [in the Arsinoite nome, while] the measurements of this house and this courtyard make ; divine cubits <vacat> from south;10- [(to) north, divine cubits <vacat>] (from) west (to) East. The boundaries of this house ; and its courtyard above: south:;11- [the house of the] HarpaȬsis and, sharing the same plot, the house of HarpaȬsis, which ; is in the possession of his children . . .;12- [north? . . .] the houses . . . Te[s]enouphis, west <the> house of Tesenouphis (son of) ; Horus and his [brothers];13- . . . . . . . . . house of Harpaiates (son of) HarpaȬsis.

listBibl.bibl: Todd M. Hickey, Joseph G. Manning, A Roman-Period Cession of Presidential Property from Soknopaiou Nesos: in F. Hoffmann - H.J Thissen, Res Severa verum Gaudium. Festschrift fuer Karl-Theodor Zauzic zum 65. Geburtstag am 8. Juni 2004, 13-14, 2004, Pl. XVII
